rationale: The segment describes the industry's state ('on really high alert'), not an intensified risk-adjective about the virus itself.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: The phrase 'on really high alert' is an intensified version of the critical alert phrase 'on high alert'.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.
